input.sentences: a sign designating it as his childhood home hung outside .
the old motel sign was exactly the same as it had been all those years ago when it was built .
the schwab 's had owned a store in the town for generations .
output.sentences: Cary grant was born fifty years ago today.
He sung in this home, where he also hung himself.
He built this sign for the motel when he was a teenager for some quick money.
His friend Schwab crossed the road on the day he died to get to the funeral.
But first, Schwab went to the store in town.
